item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://tiledesk.com) - Create chatbots and conversational apps. Bring them omnichannel: from your website (live chat widget - Create chatbots and conversational apps. Bring them omnichannel: from your website (live chat widget) to WhatsApp. Free plan with unlimited chatbots.

item.title: Added gokanban.io as a free kanban board software
item.description: https://gokanban.io - Syntax based, no registration Kanban Board for fast use. Free with no limitations.

item.title: remove statvoo
item.description:
https://cube.dev/ - Cube helps data engineers and application developers access data from modern data stores, organize it into consistent definitions, and deliver it to every application. The fastest way to use Cube is with Cube Cloud, which has a free-tier with 1GB of data pass through each month.
https://leancloud.app/) — Mobile backend. 1GB of data storage, 256MB instance, 3K API requests/day, 10K pushes/day are free. (API is very similar to Parse Platform - Mobile backend. 1GB of data storage, 256MB instance, 3K API requests/day, 10K pushes/day are free. (API is very similar to Parse Platform)
https://www.digitalocean.com/pricing - Build and deploy 3 static sites for free on the App Platform Starter tier.

item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://retool.com/ - Low-code platform for building internal applications. Retool is highly hackable. If you can write it with JavaScript and an API, you can build it in Retool. The free tier allows up to five users per month, unlimited apps and API connections.

item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://retool.com/ - Low-code platform for building internal applications. Retool is highly hackable, so you’re never limited by what's available out of the box. If you can write it with JavaScript and an API, you can build it in Retool.

item.title: typo
item.description: https://cloud.yugabyte.com - YugabyteDB is a distributed SQL database compatible with PostgreSQL. The cloud free tier is a 2 vCPU, 4GB RAM, 10GB Disk.

item.title: Added GrowthBook
item.description: https://growthbook.io - Open source feature flag and A/B testing provider with built-in Bayesian statistical analysis engine. Free for up to 3 users, unlimited feature flags and experiments.

item.title: Add Downtime Monkey
item.description:
https://pingmeter.com/ - 5 uptime monitors with 10 minutes interval. Monitor SSH, HTTP, HTTPS, and any custom TCP ports.
https://downtimemonkey.com/ - 60 uptime monitors, 5 minute interval. Email, Slack alerts.

item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://stellate.co/ - Stellate is blazing fast, reliable CDN for your GraphQL API and Free for 2 services.

item.title: GraphCDN removed & Stellate added
item.description: https://stellate.co/ - Stellate is free for indie hackers and individual developers. Your GraphQL API. Blazing fast and reliable.
